title: Creates new date for payment of school taxes and repeals provisions of SCTA; repealer
summary: Amend the Suffolk county tax act, in relation to shifting the collection date for school taxes to October fifteenth over a five-year period and to repeal sections 7, 8, 9 and 10 of such act relating to the application of such act.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the Suffolk county tax act, in relation to shifting the collection date for school taxes to October fifteenth over a five-year period and to repeal sections 7, 8, 9 and 10 of such act relating to the application of such act
